title: Establishing a Validation Framework of Treatment Discontinuation in Claims Data Using Natural Language Processing and Electronic Health Records
details: CT Yang, K Ngan, DH Kim, J Yang, J Liu, KJ Lin - Clinical Pharmacology & …, 2025
abstract: Measuring medication discontinuation in claims data primarily relies on the gaps between prescription fills, but such definitions are rarely validated. This study aimed to establish a natural language processing (NLP)‐based validation framework to …

title: Plexin D1 accumulation in the spinal motor neurons of patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis

abstract: Background Plexin D1 in endothelial cells (ECs) in the spinal cord (SC) has emerged as a key protein in spinal motor neuron (MN) maturation. Here, we pathologically investigated plexin D1 expression in the SCs of patients with sporadic amyotrophic …
